Texts.Chs: 现在也许你应该建造一所^orange;生化实验台^reset;了，并着手学习化学的奥妙！
Texts.Eng: Now perhaps it's time you created a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset; and start learning about the wonders of chemistry!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;沙^reset;无处不在，但它却可以制作宝贵的^orange;硅^reset;。你可以在^orange;沙漠^reset;特征的星球上找到大量的沙。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Sand^reset; might get everywhere but it is a valuable source of ^orange;silicon^reset;. It is most abundant on ^orange;desert^reset; biomes. You'll need caliche from a desert too, so you should head to one soon.
